title: Doom Patrol: Book Two
description: The World's Strangest Heroes continue their adventures in this next collection of Grant Morrison's career-launching run on Doom Patrol. For the first time, meet Danny the Street and subsequently Flex Mentallo. But the team soon realizes that there may be more to Flex than they first realized... who is the real Flex? Collects Doom Patrol #35-50.
author: Grant Morrison
